intro: We are a small, independent 501(c)(3) nonprofit founded by volunteers in March 2020. We strive to provide the most timely and accurate local COVID data so that every American can make informed decisions during the pandemic. Your donations help our full-time staff keep this site running.

sections.title: Support our efforts to provide clear, accurate COVID data.
sections.copy:
Our goal this month is to raise $25,000 to help cover basic operating costs. With your donation, we can:

* Improve data quality
* Fight misinformation
* Reach more people
* Inspire more action

sections.title: Act now. Donate now.
sections.copy:
To join us in the fight against COVID, you can:

* Donate online using the form on this page. 
* Send a check payable to: **Act Now Coalition**. We accept checks for amounts larger than $500. For smaller amounts, we ask that you use the online form. This is to minimize overhead costs so we can focus as much of our time as possible on bringing you COVID data.

> 340 S. Lemon Ave, #6683 
>
> Walnut, CA 91789

* Double your impact with an employer match.
* Recommend a grant from your donor-advised fund such as Fidelity or Vanguard. Our EIN: 85-0613766. Our organization name may show up as “Act Now Coalition.”

Questions? Email [info@covidactnow.org](mailto:info@covidactnow.org).
